EZOQEQESHO: UBUME






UBUME



UQHAGAMSHELWANO



Uqeqesho lwenziwa kwezi nkalo zilandelayo:

* IMfundo ePhakamileyo: ukubonelela ngoqeqesho kwimfundo ephakamileyo (isiqinisekiso semfundo ephakamileyo, idiploma nesidanga) kwiinkalo ezifanelekileyo kumafama azibandakanya ngokuzimisela kanasenezayo ngolimo, oomanejala basefama nabacebisi.
* IMfundo eQhubekayo noqeqesho- Further Education & Training (FET): ukuzisa uqeqesho olungummiselo nolo lungengommiselo kwiFET kumafama azimiseleyo nabasebenzi basefama abavela kwiindawo ezzaingananzwanga ngaphamabili ukukhuthaza iinkqubo zokulima nokufuya nokwenza kubekho ukutya kwezi ndawo zoluntu.
